title: Colours
summary: Colour is a powerful tool in design, shaping hierarchy, guiding attention, and reinforcing brand identity. In Green, colours work alongside whitespace and typography to create clarity and balance.

columns.text: Our six brand colors form the foundation of the Green design system. Each color has been carefully selected to create a vibrant and cohesive palette that reflects our brandâ€™s identity while maintaining flexibility across various design elements.

Building on these six core colors, we have developed a comprehensive palette for each, featuring 14 tints per color. These extended palettes allow for greater versatility and nuance, ensuring consistency and depth across all visual elements.
